name: AZINE
description:
To commemorate Asian Pacific American Heritage Month this year, the Figma Asian-American and Pacific Islander (AAPI) employee resource group solicited pieces around the theme of Border/Lands in order to explore what the lived AAPI experience means.


In this issue, we present to you art, comics, essays, poetry, recipes, and even a playlist. As you comb through the pages of AZINE (our portmanteau of “azn” and “zine”), we hope the stories and images here bring you closer to our contributors. We also invite you to reflect on the ways in which borders and lands have shaped your own identity. 


Contributors: Abigail Africa, Diana Chang (張兆晴), Lizhi Fan (范砾之), Aashima Garg, Katie Jiang (江圆圆), Hanna Kim (김조은), Jessica Liu (刘思晨), Isabel Ren, Dipa Halder, Shana Hu (胡天睿), Silas Tsui (崔思哲), Clara Ujiie (趙天玉), William Wu (吴威利), Emily Zhong (钟思华)


Organizing committee: Ana Boyer (博安娜), Irene Chao, Vanessa Yuri Chung (정유리), Darren Lee (李家俊), Jusung Lee (이주성), Chang Liu (刘畅), Shirley Miao, Wayne Ng (伍偉健), Radhika Parashar, Josh Shi (史荣挺)
